cyclone.name: DELTA
cyclone.current_location: about 130 mi south of Negril, Jamaica
cyclone.trajectory: forecast to turn northwest across the north-western Caribbean, cross western Cuba Tuesday, then move through the central Gulf toward the Louisiana coast late Thursday

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch for the Cuban provinces of Pinar del Rio and Artemisa, including the Isle of Youth; Tropical Storm Watch for La Habana Province
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning for the Cayman Islands (including Little Cayman and Cayman Brac)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Western Cuba, Yucatán Channel, eastern and central Gulf of Mexico, and northern Gulf coast from about the upper Texas coast eastward to Alabama/Mississippi
weather_observation.wind: Low chance (≈3%) of 39-mph gusts late week; otherwise breezy 20–30 mph winds possible
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected along the Corpus Christi coast given forecast track well east
weather_observation.rainfall: Occasional outer-fringe showers possible; significant heavy rain not expected
weather_observation.other_hazards: None anticipated for port operations at this time
